statements: SELECT user_id, notification_text, send_datetime, notification_type, is_sent FROM push_notifications WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT notification_text, notification_type FROM push_notifications WHERE send_datetime < '2022-01-01'
SELECT notification_text, send_datetime FROM push_notifications WHERE is_sent = TRUE
SELECT user_id, notification_text FROM push_notifications ORDER BY send_datetime DESC
SELECT * FROM push_notifications WHERE notification_type = 'important'
SELECT * FROM push_notifications WHERE user_id = 123 AND is_sent = TRUE ORDER BY send_datetime DESC;
SELECT user_id, notification_text FROM push_notifications WHERE notification_type = 'New Product' LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, notification_text, send_datetime FROM push_notifications WHERE is_sent = FALSE AND send_datetime BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY user_id;
SELECT notification_text, send_datetime FROM push_notifications WHERE notification_type LIKE 'Discount%' AND is_sent = FALSE;
SELECT DISTINCT notification_type FROM push_notifications WHERE user_id IN (456, 789) ORDER BY notification_type ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS purchase_count FROM purchases GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, product_name, purchase_date FROM purchases WHERE purchase_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, json_extract(preferences, '$.theme') AS user_theme FROM users WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY email DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_purchases FROM purchases GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_purchases > 2;
SELECT u.username, p.product_name, p.purchase_date FROM users u JOIN purchases p ON u.user_id = p.user_id WHERE u.user_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE purchase_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, product_name FROM purchases WHERE product_name LIKE '%Apple%';
SELECT user_id, message, sent_date FROM push_notifications ORDER BY sent_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE username='john_doe';
SELECT user_id, preferences FROM users WHERE preferences->'theme' = 'dark';
SELECT * FROM purchases INNER JOIN users ON purchases.user_id = users.user_id WHERE product_name LIKE '%Phone%';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price < 50;
SELECT user_id, product_id, quantity FROM purchases ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT notification_id, message, send_date FROM notifications WHERE is_sent = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM users JOIN purchases ON users.user_id = purchases.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT user_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_purchases FROM purchases GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, message, send_date FROM notifications WHERE is_sent = false ORDER BY send_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT notification_type, message FROM notifications ORDER BY sent_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, is_read FROM user_notifications WHERE notification_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price >= 50 ORDER BY category DESC;

SELECT u.username, p.product_name, n.message FROM users u JOIN purchases pu ON u.user_id = pu.user_id JOIN products p ON pu.product_id = p.product_id JOIN notifications n ON u.user_id = n.user_id WHERE u.username = 'John' AND p.category = 'Electronics';

SELECT u.username, p.product_name, n.message FROM users u, purchases pu, products p, notifications n WHERE u.user_id = pu.user_id AND pu.product_id = p.product_id AND u.user_id = n.user_id AND u.user_id = 1 AND p.price < 100;
